Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista® Magnesium Flex® Reagent Cartridge (MG)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista® Chemistry 1 Calibrator and Magnesium Flex® Reagent Cartridge for quantitative measurement and calibration of multiple analytes including magnesium on the Dimension Vista® System.
Indications for Use Summary: Magnesium Flex® Reagent Cartridge enables quantitative measurement of magnesium in human serum, plasma, and urine for diagnosis and treatment of hypomagnesemia and hypermagnesemia; Chemistry 1 Calibrator is for calibration of multiple analyte methods including magnesium, BUN, calcium, cholesterol, creatinine, glucose, lactic acid, thyroxine, thyronine uptake, and uric acid on the Dimension Vista® System.
